official_title: To amend the Southern Arizona Water Rights Settlement Act of 1982.
short_title: Southern Arizona Water Rights Settlement Amendments Act of 1992

summary.text: Southern Arizona Water Rights Settlement Amendments Act of 1992 - Amends the Southern Arizona Water Rights Settlement Act of 1982 to revise the settlement agreement between the United States, the Tohono O'Odham Nation and its individual members and allottees in the San Xavier Reservation and Eastern Schuk Toak District, the city of Tucson, and other parties involving water rights claims in southern Arizona.

titles.title: Southern Arizona Water Rights Settlement Amendments Act of 1992
To amend the Southern Arizona Water Rights Settlement Act of 1982.
